name: Aditya Bahuudeshiya Janvikas Sanstha
briefDescription: Aditya Bahudashiya Janvikas Sanstha  is a grassroots level non-government, non-profit making voluntary organization registered under applicable laws. The organization has its main office in Kaij  of Beed district of Maharashtra, India. Since 2005 , the organization is striving for the development and improvement of the vulnerable and weaker sections of the society residing mainly in backward Beed district of Maharashtra, India.
